Job Description: - Develop the functionalities assigned with the Works Items. If no work Items are assigned, take into account some Work Item that are assigned to another developer and alert the product manager.  - Write the list of tasks carried out.  - Check that the work Items are up to date linked to the activity provided during the day. Update the fields Completed Work and Remaining Work .  - Read the content of the Work Item you will work on the next day. If you do not understand the content, contact your product manager.  - The development of the interface of a new dialog box must respect the standard used in the rest of the product.  - Respect the development deadline  - Provide a good quality of work   Required Skills -C# , -.Net Framework 4,  - Windows platform, - Object-oriented programming concepts (really good knowledge requested)  - Use of collaborative tools Microsoft TFS or DevOps Server
UG: Any Graduate in Any Specialization, Graduation Not Required
PG: Post Graduation Not Required, Any Postgraduate in Any Specialization
Doctorate: Any Doctorate in Any Specialization, Doctorate Not Required
